languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс не то кашляет, не то смеется.{/n} "Иной потерявший терпение аколит счел бы твои слова оскорблением Святого Ордоса. Тебе везет, что это не я".
{n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс не то кашляет, не то смеется.{/n} "Иной потерявший терпение аколит счел бы твои слова оскорблением Святого Ордоса. Тебе везет, что это не я".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希哼了一声，既像是咳嗽，又像是压抑的笑声。{/n}“若是换做没那么有耐心的侍仆，恐怕会认为你的发言是在侮辱审判庭。但你运气不错，因为我非常有耐心。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希哼了一声，既像是咳嗽，又像是压抑的笑声。{/n}“若是换做没那么有耐心的侍仆，恐怕会认为你的发言是在侮辱审判庭。但你运气不错，因为我非常有耐心。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix produce un sonido que podría ser una tos o una risa contenida.{/n} «Un acólito menos paciente consideraría eso un insulto a los Santos Ordos. Por suerte para usted, soy muy paciente».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix produce un sonido que podría ser una tos o una risa contenida.{/n} «Un acólito menos paciente consideraría eso un insulto a los Santos Ordos. Por suerte para usted, soy muy paciente».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは咳き込むような、笑いを押し殺したような音を出す。{/n}「忍耐力のないアコライトなら、それは聖なる宗団に対する侮辱だと思うことでしょう。しかし、陛下にとって幸いなことに、我はとても忍耐強いのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは咳き込むような、笑いを押し殺したような音を出す。{/n}「忍耐力のないアコライトなら、それは聖なる宗団に対する侮辱だと思うことでしょう。しかし、陛下にとって幸いなことに、我はとても忍耐強いのです」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix émet un bruit qui pourrait être une toux aussi bien qu'un rire étouffé.{/n} « Un acolyte moins patient y verrait une insulte au Saint Ordo. Heureusement pour vous, j'ai beaucoup de patience. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix émet un bruit qui pourrait être une toux aussi bien qu'un rire étouffé.{/n} « Un acolyte moins patient y verrait une insulte au Saint Ordo. Heureusement pour vous, j'ai beaucoup de patience. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix macht ein Geräusch, das ein Husten oder ein unterdrücktes Lachen sein könnte.{/n} "Ein weniger geduldiger Akolyth würde das als Beleidigung der Heiligen Ordos betrachten. Zu Eurem Glück bin ich sehr geduldig."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix macht ein Geräusch, das ein Husten oder ein unterdrücktes Lachen sein könnte.{/n} "Ein weniger geduldiger Akolyth würde das als Beleidigung der Heiligen Ordos betrachten. Zu Eurem Glück bin ich sehr geduldig."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, öksürük veya bastırılmış bir gülüş olarak yorumlanabilecek bir ses çıkarıyor.{/n} "Benim kadar sabırlı olmayan bir havari, bunu Kutsal Nizam'a hakaret olarak değerlendirebilirdi. Şanslısın ki ben sabırlıyımdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix makes a sound that could be a cough or a suppressed laugh.{/n} "A less patient acolyte would consider that an insult to the Holy Ordos. Luckily for you, I am very patient."
